plot: A UK game show, based on the game of bingo, where contestants answer questions to complete winning lines on their gamecard in the hope of winning cash and prizes.
plot_en: A UK game show, based on the game of bingo, where contestants answer questions to complete winning lines on their gamecard in the hope of winning cash and prizes.
plot_es: A UK game show, based on the game of bingo, where contestants answer questions to complete winning lines on their gamecard in the hope of winning cash and prizes.
title: Bob's Full House
